scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && cd dist && mkdir test && babel ../test -s -d test
scripts.build-routes: npm run clean-routes && cd dist && mkdir routes && babel ../routes -s -d routes
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel server.js -s -d dist
scripts.test: npm run clean-test && npm run build-test && mocha "dist/test/routes/routeTest.js" --exit && npm run coverage
scripts.production: npm run build && npm run build-routes && npm run test && node bin/production
